entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Periods of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 21 except minus 25 in low lying areas.
